short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wrap search terms in the Google Ads Search Terms report

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily wrap search terms in Google Ads!

This works in the Search Terms report.

Do you want to add keywords? Transform all keywords directly to exact or phrase match.

Do you want to exclude keywords? Transform all keywords directly to phrase or broad match. You can also remove a value from the search terms so you do not have to do it manually.

Simple but saves time :)
